attributes.action: ban those who recieve their main salary from the public purse from selling their story for at least 3 years after they leave public service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many civil servants, service personnel and MP's are spending their working day planning their 'for sale story', or cashing in on their outing of controversial events that are often not in the public interest. A 3-year ban would prevent this misuse of public money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
